item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Bob Marley
item.description: "Wake up and live" -- Bob Marley

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by James Dean
item.description: "Dream as if you will live forever; Live as if you will die today." -- James Dean

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Emily Dickinson
item.description: "Forever is composed of nows." -- Emily Dickinson

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "You must live in the present, launch yourself on every wave, find your eternity in each moment. Fools stand on their island of opportunities and look toward another land. There is no other land; there is no other life but this." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love ..." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Horace
item.description:
"Carpe diem."
(Odes: I.11)" -- Horace

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "Dost thou love life? Then do not squander time, for that's the stuff life is made of." -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description:
"Write it on your heart that every day is the best day in the year. He is rich who owns the day, and no one owns the day who allows it to be invaded with fret and anxiety.
Finish every day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities, no doubt crept in. Forget them as soon as you can, tomorrow is a new day; begin it well and serenely, with too high a spirit to be cumbered with your old nonsense.
This new day is too dear, with its hopes and invitations, to waste a moment on the yesterdays." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Hans Christian Andersen
item.description: "Enjoy life. There's plenty of time to be dead." -- Hans Christian Andersen

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by John Keating (Dead Poets Society)
item.description: "Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary. " -- John Keating (Dead Poets Society)

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Jack Black
item.description: "I'm fairly certain that YOLO is just Carpe Diem for stupid people." -- Jack Black

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Robert Gerus
item.description: "Live, laugh, love for tomorrow in another day." -- Robert Gerus

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Virgil
Kittyplatekate add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "Perfection of character is this: to live each day as if it were your last, without frenzy, without apathy, without pretence." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by The Beatles
item.description: "But tomorrow my rain, so I'll follow the sun" -- The Beatles

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
item.description: "Nothing is worth more than this day." -- Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "Don't count the days, make the days count." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by R.A. Salvatore
item.description: "We are all dying, every moment that passes of every day. That is the inescapable truth of this existence. It is a truth that can paralyze us with fear, or one that can energize us with impatience, with the desire to explore and experience, with the hope- nay, the iron-will!- to find a memory in every action. To be alive, under sunshine, or starlight, in weather fair or stormy. To dance with every step, be they through gardens of flowers or through deep snows." -- R.A. Salvatore

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Thomas Merton
item.description: "If a man is to live, he must be all alive, body, soul, mind, heart, spirit." -- Thomas Merton

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Jonathan Larson
item.description: "No day but today." -- Jonathan Larson

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Live a good life. In the end it is not the years in a life, but the life in the years." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Art Buchwald
item.description: "Whether it is the best of times or the worst of times, it is the only time we have. " -- Art Buchwald

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Edith Wharton
item.description: "Set wide the window. Let me drink the day." -- Edith Wharton

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by J.R. Ward
item.description:
"You could lose the ones you loved in the blink of an eye—and he was willing to bet, when it happened, you weren’t thinking about all the reasons that could have kept you apart. You thought of all the reasons that kept you together.
And, no doubt, how you wished you’d had more time. Even if you’d had centuries…
When you were young, you thought time was a burden, something to be discharged as fast as possible so you could be grown-up. But it was such a bait-n-switch—when you were an adult, you came to realize that minutes and hours were the single most precious thing you had.
No one got forever. And it was a fucking crime to waste what you were given." -- J.R. Ward

item.title: Kittyplatekate add a quote by Horace
item.description:
"Carpe diem, quam minimum credula postero."
(<i>Odes: I.11</i>)" -- Horace
